string.name: desc
string.value: The Transcendent of Light's authority over the power of creation brings about this curse. You will slowly recover HP, but there is a reduction to your final damage count. Flames erupt around you periodically, dealing damage. You'll receive a large penalty if you're afflicted by both the Creative Curse and the Destructive Curse at the same time.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Transcendent of Light's authority over the power of destruction brings about this curse. Your final damage count increases, but you also receive more damage from hits, and you cannot use consumables. You'll receive a large penalty if you're afflicted by both the Creative Curse and the Destructive Curse at the same time.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've been provoked by Mitsuhide! Your attacks against Mitsuhide deal more damage, but your defenses against him are weakened. If you don't deal enough damage within the time limit, you'll be overwhelmed by Mitsuhide's powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've been overwhelmed by Mitsuhide's attacks! Your attacks have been crippled, but you also take less damage. Mitsuhide's mirror images have descended upon you en masse.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've been struck by Mitsuhide's counterattack! Whenever Mitsuhide is struck with a stun or bind effect, or one of his provoked targets are defeated, your party will be temporarily immobilized by a bolt of lightning, and Mitsuhide grows in strength.
